thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 26 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: S&P Global Posts Q1 Earnings Per Share $1.93

author: Reuters Editorial
title: S&P Global Posts Q1 Earnings Per Share $1.93
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - S&P Global Inc:
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.93 * Q1 REVENUE $1.567 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $1.53 BILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.97 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* REDUCED ITS GAAP DILUTED EPS GUIDANCE BY APPROXIMATELY TWENTY CENTS TO A RANGE OF $7.95 TO $8.10 FOR 2018
* QTRLY PLATTS REVENUE INCREASED 3% TO $196 MILLION * PLATTS QUARTERLY OPERATING PROFIT INCREASED 9% TO $90 MILLION
* QTRLY ADJUSTED OPERATING PROFIT FOR PLATTS DECLINED 4% TO $95 MILLION
* LEFT ADJUSTED DILUTED EPS GUIDANCE UNCHANGED WITH A RANGE OF $8.45 TO $8.60 FOR 2018
* “RATINGS BUSINESS WAS ABLE TO NAVIGATE WEAK BOND ISSUANCE AND DELIVER TOP-LINE GROWTH” IN QUARTER Source text for Eikon:
